pageContent: Context: Prostate cancer is the most frequent male cancer. Since the median age of diagnosis is 66 yr, many patients require both geriatric and urologic evaluation if treatment is to be tailored to individual circumstances including comorbidities and frailty.

metaData.source:
Treatment profile and complications associated with cryotherapy for localized prostate cancer: a population-based study
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/21519347/
